Rice
Onions
Meat
Cooking Oil My Recipes Recipe Name Ingredients Directions Cut the onions to smaller sizes. Put them in the cooking pan(sufuria). Add 5 tablespoonfuls of cooking oil. Cook until golden brown. Add meat and simmer(Sijui hii ni nini). Add 5 cups of water. Add Rice. Finish. Serve while hot.
